attributes.action: Have uefa take action on manchester united for chanting about Hillsborough.
attributes.background: On the 10th of march at anfield manchester united fans were illicitly chanting about the Hillsborough disaster. Liverpool got charged with it and manchester united got let off scott free. This ruins football. There is no place in football for this kind of bigotry.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament do not have the power to compel UEFA to take this action.
